name: the-correspondence-of-baron-de-vioménil-data
title: The Correspondence of Baron de Vioménil Data
description: Metadata and data derived from The Correspondence of Baron de Vioménil. The Correspondence of Baron de Vioménil Project is part of an effort at the George Washington Presidential Library at Mount Vernon to transcribe and translate the manuscript papers of Vioménil, a French officer who served during the American War for Independence. It has been generously funded by the Richard Lounsbery Foundation.

contributors.title: George Washington Presidential Library at Mount Vernon
